name: Forgotten Ritual
description:
The island forgot about their tradition to honor the dragon Shenlong, who protected them for many hundred years. And soon after that, they forget about him too.
Shenlong grew angry, unhappy.
And thus he brought them misfortune, from which he protected them so long
Only a young man, Jingyi, remembered him.. Will he be able to save them?

"Forgotten Ritual" is designed for the Windows PC and can be controlled with a keyboard and controller.

Instructions for installing:     

1. Download ZIP file     
2. Right click and select "Extract All...".    
3. Save the file in a safe and dry place    
4. Start the .exe with anticipation     
5. Have fun playing!
